short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to stop and breathe at configurable intervals

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to remind you to pause and breathe at a configurable interval.  It uses the box method of breathing (7 seconds inhale, hold, 7 seconds exhale, hold) and will help calm you down in the chaotic world we live in. You can set the frequency in minutes, and the default is every hour.
